acidity.notes: Dark, brooding, glowing, round cherry note. Doesn't come and go, rather it colors the whole taste.

sweetness.notes: Gives the cherry note more focus, like a plum vs. cherry cough syrup.

finish.notes: Dark feeling in throat, acidic. Not my favorite.

flavor: Soft, syrupy, mellow on sip. Cherry note colors flavor rather than coming and going. Not as earthy/woody as other cups. Further mellows as cools.
notes: 8 second bloom swirl, but more vigorous.
